raw_body:
SINNIAH – TALIA SHALINI – Darling daughter of Chinna (Bernard) and Anita,​ beloved sister of Michael & Kevin,​ loving granddaughter of the late B.R.R. and Jeyadevi Sinniah and the late Allan and Philomena Seneviratne,​ passed away peacefully on the 12th of January 2024. Her funeral will take place at All Saints Church,​ Hersham U.K. on the 1st of February 2024. “Dale Cottage”,​ 182,​ Silverdale Avenue,​ Walton-On-Thames,​ KT12 1EL,​ U.K.
006758
